DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to determine whether the HPMC capsule of D961H 40 mg is bioequivalent to gelatine capsules of D961H 40 mg after a steady state is reached on Day 5
DOC.brief_title: Study Comparing Gelatine Capsule 40 mg D961H and HPMC Capsule in Japanese Healthy Males
DOC.criteria: Healthy Japanese Classified as homoEM Negative for HIV, Hepatitis B, Hepatitis C and syphilis Significant clinical illness from 2 weeks preceding the preentry visit to the randomization Past or present cardiac, renal, hepatic, neurological or gastrointestinal disease
